Name: AIM: Attack Improvement Mod
Description: For BattleTech 1.3.2. Fix, enhance, and upgrade the attack experience, from Line of Sight to Hit Distribution. Each feature can be configured individually.
Author: Sheepy

Settings.settings.json: The mod use settings.json to read and write settings.  If the file does not exist, it will be created when the mod is loaded on game launch.
